rows: I helped create a krasis that I love like a pet and would carry with me everywhere... except it's the size of a building, and it might eat me.
In my laboratory, I discovered something that I think could eliminate half the life on Ravnica.
The other researchers in my clade are my family—a big, eccentric family including members and parts of many species.
The laboratory where I did my research contains everything that is precious to me.
I will get revenge on the shortsighted fool who killed my precious krasis creation.
Everything I do is an attempt to impress someone I love.

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: I have a rather embarrassing mutation that I do everything I can to keep hidden.
I'm more interested in taking notes on monstrous anatomy than in fighting monsters.
Every social situation I'm in seems to lead to my asking rude personal questions.
I'm supremely confident in my ability to adapt to any situation and handle any danger.
I'll take any risk to earn recognition for my scientific brilliance.
I have a tendency to take shortcuts in my research and any other tasks I have to complete.

entries.name: Contacts
entries: The fluid nature of clades, whose rosters span different laboratories and change as researchers discover new interests, creates abundant connections among the Simic. The guild members live in watery sinkholes called zonots, and their isolation shelters them from much contact with outsiders. Nonetheless, a fair number of Simic members are former members of other guilds.
Roll twice on the Simic Contacts table (for an ally and a rival) and once on the Non-Simic Contacts table.

entries.caption: Simic Contacts
rows: My research builds on my parents' work and takes it in interesting new directions.
If a serious problem confounds me, I can count on my mentor to provide clarity of thought.
A former laboratory colleague went on to work on the Guardian Project.
A former colleague has ventured into fields of research that are possibly immoral and almost certainly illegal.
A former lover is now the supervisor of a prominent clade.
My sibling has become an almost unrecognizable mutant.
An old friend has retreated into a secluded life as an ascetic deepsage, devoted to contemplating philosophical principles.
My former clade supervisor is now engaged in field research studying some of the largest beasts and monsters on Ravnica.

entries.caption: Non-Simic Contacts
rows: My older sibling is upset that I didn't follow them into the Azorius.
A Boros sergeant is always asking questions about my work, but I suspect they're genuinely curious.
A friend in my clade thinks I don't know they're a Dimir agent.
I helped a Golgari spore druid with the fertilization and growth of their fungus field.
I can't fathom what could have made my childhood friend run off and join the Gruul.
I love comparing notes with my friend in the Izzet, though our fields of research are very different.
I borrowed a lot of money from an Orzhov syndic to help finance my research.
A Rakdos ringmaster has taken an interest in my research which, come to think of it, might make a nice sideshow act.
I left the Selesnya—and a lover—behind when I joined the Simic.
Roll an additional Simic contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.

entries.name: How Do I Fit In?
entries: As a Simic adventurer, your mission likely aligns with the Adaptationist philosophy; the disagreements and tensions among the guilds will soon erupt into open conflict, and your guild needs your help to ensure that the Simic survive. That help might come in the form of defending against Golgari incursions into Simic zonots or shielding Simic research from Azorius intrusion. It could also involve more subtle, diplomatic work to maintain balance among the guilds, or subterfuge aimed at undermining another guild's grab for power.

Self-improvement is also an important part of your mission. Anything you can do to make yourself more capable—whether learning a new spell or adopting a new hybridizing mutation—gives the Simic a stronger weapon in its arsenal. The combine must change to survive, and that means individual members of the guild must grow and adapt as well.

_.displayName: vial of acid (derived from digestive juices)

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一件漂亮的皮衣或皮靴，一套{@item 寻常服装|phb}，以及一只15GP的{@item 囊袋|phb}

entries.name: 特性：灰色地带
entries: 你熟悉一个走私者网络，他们愿意帮助你摆脱困境。在特定的城市，城镇或类似规糢的社区（DM决定），你和你的同伴能免费住在安全屋里。安全屋提供穷困的生活水平。当住在安全屋里时，你可以选择对你（和你的同伴）的存在保密。

entries.name: 成名之举
entries: 每一个走私者都有一个故事把他们和普通的罪犯区分开来。凭借着机智，航海技术和流利的口语，你活了下来以讲述这个故事-而且你经常讲述这个故事。你可以在下表投掷以决定你的讲述，或选择一个最适合你的角色的。

rows: 鲸鱼的灵魂，你把偷来的矮人灵魂藏进了一条被拖到渔船后面的鲸鱼尸体里面。当你搬运货物时，尸体突然爆炸，把鲸鱼肉和威士忌酒瓶送到了半里外。
马车和剑，你一边驾驶着一辆满载偷来的工艺品的拖车穿越战场，一边唱着水手歌谣迷惑着参战者们。
新兵入伍，你参加了另一个国家的海军，目的是把偷来的珠宝走私到一个遥远的港口。你从海军消失并来到这里之前还获得了一个小军衔。
暗影之河，你的船不小心划进了堕影冥界几个小时，期间，在你回到这个位面并划船回家之前，你还卖掉了一些偷来的龙裔艺术品。
黄金的心，你同意运送一个家庭逃离战争。孩子在检查站哭了起来，你把你所有的金子给了守卫让你过去。那家人并没有发现你的举动。
两方下注，你曾走私过一箱弩矢和数捆箭矢，并在局部战争中将两者同时运往敌对双方。双方买家很快就到场但并没有发现你的诡计。

entries.name: 建议特征
entries: 一般来说走私者看重生存，其次是利益，而不是其他的。一个人可能是另一个更大的组织的一部分，也可能是自主经营一条小走私船。走私者活在他们所说的谎言当中，他们天生就有能力回忆起他们所说的每一句谎言和每一个半真半假的事实。

entries.caption: 走私者个性
rows: 我喜欢呆在在水上但讨厌打渔。
我认为一切都能明码标价。
我总是面带微笑。
没什么东西能使我紧张，我每时每刻都在撒谎。
我热爱金子，但绝不会欺骗朋友。
我喜欢做那些别人认为不可能的事情。
当我看到太阳从海上升起来时，我会变的心烦意乱。
我可不是简单的罪犯，我可是主谋。

entries.caption: 走私者的理想
rows: {@b 财富} 我的梦想就是在一个安全的金库里堆满如山的硬币。（任意）
{@b 走私者信条} 我坚守走私者的不成文规定，我们绝不互相欺骗或直接伤害无辜者。（守序）
{@b 人为财死} 如果这意味着我能获利，我几乎什么都原意做。（邪恶）
{@b 和平兴旺} 我走私只是为了实现一个更大的目标，建设我的社区。 (善良)
{@b 人群} 尽管我谎话连篇，但是我重视友谊。（任意）
{@b 勇于冒险} 当我冒着一些风险时，我是最快乐的（任意）

entries.caption: 走私者的羁绊
rows: 我的船被偷走了，我急切的想找回它。
我打算成为我所属的走私网络的领导者。
我欠了一笔不能用黄金偿还的债务。
做完这最后一单，我就退休。
我被一个偷了我的贵重物品的同行耍了，我会找到那个小偷。
我把我大部分的利润都捐给了慈善事业，我并不想吹嘘此事。

entries.caption: 走私者的缺点
rows: 说谎是一种本能，我有时会不由自主的说谎。
我倾向于从盈亏的角度来审视我的关系。
我相信万物皆有价，且对于那些表现的品德高尚的人，我是愤世嫉俗的。
我努力相信别人的话。
很少人了解真正的我。
然我表现的很迷人，但我对别人毫无感觉，不知友情为何物。

items.name: 工具熟练
items.entry: 一种{@filter 赌具|items|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}、载具（陆上）

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一枚军阶勋章、一个取自倒下敌人的纪念物（一把匕首、断刃、一小片旗帜等）、一套骨制{@item 骰子套组|phb}或{@item 扑克牌套组|phb}、一套{@item 寻常服装|phb}、和一个装有10金币的缠腰{@item 囊袋|phb}

entries.name: 特性：军事阶级
entries: 你拥有一个来自你军人生涯的军阶。其他效忠于你军事组织的士兵仍然会承认你的地位和影响力，军阶比你低的士兵甚至会服从你的指示。你可以利用你的军阶以发挥你对其他士兵的影响力，并为临时用途而征用简易装备或马匹。你通常也可以进入承认你军阶的友方军营和堡垒。

entries.name: 特色
entries: 在你作为士兵的期间，你在你所属的单位或军队扮演着特定的职位。请从下表的选项中选择一个或骰d8随机决定你的职位：

rows: 军官
斥侯
步兵
骑兵
救护兵
军需官
旗手
后勤（伙房兵、铁匠、或其他）

entries.name: 建议特质
entries: 战争的恐怖与严格的军纪深深烙印在每个士兵的心中，塑造了他们的理念、创建了深厚的羁绊、并经常让他们伤痕累累，在恐惧、耻辱、和仇恨面前显得特别脆弱。

rows: 我总是有礼而恭敬。
我忘不了战争的恶梦。我无法攞脱回荡在脑海中的暴力画面。
我已经失去了太多朋友，且我难以交到新的友人。
我从我的军事经历中得到了许多激励人心或警世的故事，与几乎所有战斗情境都有关联。
我能跟地狱犬怒目对视，毫不畏缩。
我享受我的强壮并喜欢破坏事物。
我有着粗俗的幽默感。
我直接面对难题。最简单直接的方法就是通往成功最好的途径。
大义。我们的使命就是牺牲自己以保护他人。（善良）
责任。我做我必须去做的事，并只服从于权威。（守序）
独立。当人们盲目地服从命令，他们就是在接受某种专制。（混乱）
力量。人生如战争，强大的力量赢取一切。（邪恶）
共存。理想不值得为其杀戮或引发战争。（中立）
国家。我的国家、城市、和人民都很重要。（任意）
我仍会为了我的战友而舍命。
有人在战场上救我一命。直至今日，我永远都不会抛下朋友。
荣誉就是我的生命。
我永远不会忘记我军所遭受的那场毁灭性打击、或那些击溃我军的敌人。
那些与我并肩作战的战友都值得我舍命。
我为那些无法为自己奋战的人们而战。
我在战争时所面对的恐怖敌人仍然使我恐惧颤栗。
我看不起那些不是合格战士的人。
我曾在战争中犯下一起葬送许多性命的错误—而我会不择手段去掩盖这个错误。
我对我敌人的的仇恨是盲目且不可理喻的。
我遵守律法，即使这道法律会带来惨剧。
我宁可吃下我的盔甲也不愿认错。

_.special: trophy taken from a fallen enemy (a dagger, broken blade, or piece of a banner)

items.name: 工具熟练
items.entry: One type of {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, thieves' tools

items.name: 装备
items.entry: A small knife, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, a {@item trinket|phb} from the life you stayed behind to defend, a belt {@item pouch|phb} with 10 gp

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: Poor

entries.name: Overview
entries: "We need to leave, now!" Those words still haunt your dreams at night. When everyone was fleeing Phlan, you choose to stay. Whether out of an emotional attachment, or pursuit of riches, you made the decision that would affect the rest of your life.

Food became scarcer for those without connections. You became a beggar and to stay alive you bartered information to any interested party with food or gold to spare. You were good at what you did, and thought you were invincible. That changed when you were captured by the Tears of Virulence, the soldiers of Vorgansharax, the Maimed Virulence, for selling secrets to those bent on overthrowing the dragon. They locked you in the cells of Stojanow Gate. The first weeks you hoped to stay alive. As the weeks turned into months, and the interrogations continued you began to pray for death.

entries.name: Feature: Ex-Convict
entries: The knowledge gained during your incarceration lets you gain insight into local guards and jailors. You know which will accept bribes, or look the other way for you. You can also seek shelter for yourself from authorities with other criminals in the area. Note: This feature is a variant of the Courtier feature.

rows: I am a bully; others will suffer as I have.
I always say yes even when I mean no; it's just easier.
I aim to misbehave.
I go out of my way to frustrate or anger those in power.
I strive to obey the law. I will never again make the mistake of going against authority.
I always plan everything out. The one time I let others plan things it did not end well for me.
I take blame to protect others from pain.
I hoard information, you never know what may come in handy.
Loss. I freely give those who offend me what was so brutally denied me, death. (Chaos)
Dedication. I never betray those who trust me. (Law)
Vengeance. I use any means to get information I need; I have been well taught. (Evil)
Redemption. Everyone deserves a second chance. (Good)
Resilience. I can survive any challenge (Any)
Leadership. The best teams are made up of those that society has discarded.
I take up arms to help establish a free Phlan.
The horrors of my time in Stojanow haunt my dreams, only after a day of hard work can I find sleep.
I am indebted to those who freed me from prison, I will repay this debt.
My torturer survived the attack that set me free, I will find him/her.
I will not rest while others suffer fates similar to mine.
I am searching for a way to heal the scars of Stojanow, both physical and emotional.
During stressful times, I find myself crying for no reason.
My nerve endings are shot from the interrogations; I am numb to all but the harshest touch.
I am incapable of standing up for myself.
I folded under the torture, and gave information that I promised would be kept secret. My life would be in jeopardy if others found out.
Survival is worth more than friendship.
The ghosts from my past hinder my actions.

_.displayName: trinket from the life you stayed behind to defend

items.name: 装备
items.entry: {@item 草药工具|phb}, a small article of jewelry that is distinct to your tribe, a {@item hunting trap|phb}, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 5 gp

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: Poor

entries.name: Overview
entries: You were born into a nomadic tribe that called the Ticklebelly Hills home. You migrated from location to location, living off the land with your tribe. The tribe would seasonally travel south into the Grass Sea and the Giant's Cairn, north into the Dragonspine Mountains, and even occasionally east across the Stojanow River to the borders of the Quivering forest.

In your migrations, your people have come to know the stone giant tribes that populate the Giant's Cairn. The dragon cultists came to the hills one day—magic-users wearing purple and riding horrid beasts, black-clad warriors wearing wicked masks, and even soldiers from the nearby town of Phlan. Then the dragon called Vorgansharax arrived and laired in the hills, causing horrid thickets to grow and animals to act unusually. The cultists began raiding nomad camps for victims to offer to the wyrm. Eventually, the dragon moved on to attack Phlan, but life was never again the same for the nomads of the Ticklebelly Hills.

entries.name: Feature: At Home in the Wild
entries: The wilderness is your home and you are comfortable dwelling in it. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate when out in the wild. This place of rest is secure enough to conceal you from most natural threats. Threats that are supernatural, magical, or are actively seeking you out might do so with difficulty depending on the nature of the threat (as determined by the DM). However, this feature doesn't shield or conceal you from scrying, mental probing, nor from threats that don't necessarily require the five senses to find you. Note: This feature is a variant of the Folk Hero feature.

entries.name: 建议特征
entries: Ticklebelly nomads only venture into civilization when necessary. You are social within your tribe, with tribes of other nomads, and even with the stone giant tribes that populate the Giant's Cairn. However, other communities tend to either put you on your guard or put you in a state of wonder. Was it this wonder that enticed you into a life of adventuring? On the other hand, you are fiercely protective of and dedicated to your tribe. Perhaps it was this dedication that led you to venture out; either of your own will or at the behest of your tribe's leaders.

rows: I eagerly inject myself into the unknown.
Villages, towns, and cities do not suit me. I'd rather be out in the wilderness any day.
I accomplish my tasks efficiently, using as few resources as possible.
It's difficult for me to remain in one place for long.
I loudly brag about my tribe every chance I get.
Having walked among giants, I am fearless in the face of bigger creatures.
I am quiet and reserved, but observant. Nothing escapes my attention.
My word is my bond. I see a promise to completion, even if it conflicts with my beliefs.
Kinship. Family is most important in life. Though I may be far from my own, the bonds of family must be protected in others' lives as well. (Good)
Preservation. Nature must not be despoiled by encroaching civilization. (Any)
Wanderlust. One must expand their horizons by seeing the world and exploring. (Chaos)
Isolation. My tribe and its ways must be protected and shielded from outside influence. (Neutral)
Protection. Threats to the land and to the people must be dealt with at any and all costs. (Law)
Belonging: All creatures have a place in the world, so I strive to help others find theirs. (Good)
I ache to return to my tribe and the family I left, but cannot until my obligations are fulfilled.
The dragon cultists that invaded my homeland stole away one of my tribe's people. I will not know rest until I've found them.
The dragon's presence in the hills destroyed valuable territory and resulted in deaths within my tribe. The creature must pay for what it has done.
I carry a trinket that spiritually and emotionally ties me to my people and my home.
I discovered a strange relic in the hills during my tribe's wanderings. I must discover what it is.
One of the stone giant clans from the Giant's Cairn has graced me with a mark of kinship.
I throw myself and my friends into situations rarely ever thinking about consequences.
Unfamiliar people and surroundings put me on edge.
I have absolutely no patience for slowpokes and those who prove indecisive.
My desire to experience new things causes me to make unsafe choices.
I am overly protective of nature, sometimes to the detriment of my companions and myself.
My lack of worldliness often proves my undoing in social, commercial, and hostile situations.

_.special: small article of jewelry that is distinct to your tribe

items.name: 装备
items.entry: {@item 盗贼工具|phb}, a gray cloak, Sheriff's insignia (badge) a set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, and 17 gp

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: Modest

entries.name: Overview
entries: You are one of the many people that make sure the trade routes are clear at ALL times. You assure that the Great Law of Trade is followed at all costs. You work by yourself or in groups to quell bandits and brigands who might stop trade routes from going through. You investigate potential ambushes and possible rumors as to someone wanting to rob or stop caravans. You are as much an investigator as you are law enforcement.

You are able to go into a town/village around the Hillsfar area and find a contact that is willing to give you information from rumor to fact. This sometimes comes at a cost of a minor bribe of 1-9 silver pieces.

entries.name: Feature: Investigative Services
entries: You are part of a small force outside of Hillsfar. You have a special way of communicating with others and they seem to be at ease around you. You can invoke your rank to allow you access to a crime scene or to requisition equipment or horses on a temporary basis. When you enter a town or village around Hillsfar you can identify a contact who will give you information on the local rumors and would help you simply because of your desire to get answers and information for anyone wanting to disrupt trade. Note: This feature is a variant of the soldier feature.

rows: I am always polite and respectful
I let my actions speak for themselves
I am haunted by my past having seen the murder of a close friend or family member and it is the one case I always needed to solve but have not been able to.
I am quick to judge and slow to vindicate
I can be very persuasive and am able to ask quest ions where others might not be able to.
I have a quirky personality that seems to take others off their guard.
My sense of humor is considered by most to be awkward.
Everyone has a choice, and they can always make the right choice, mine!
Hope. my job is to speak for the victim (Good)
Dedicated. Once I start an investigation, until told to do so, I do not quit, not matter where it leads. (Lawful)
Nation. My city, nation, or people are all that matter. (Any)
Mercenary. When I do investigations, I expect answers immediately. (Any)
Eloquent. I use my words to sway others to give me answers. (Good)
Might. It is through threats and force that I get my answers. (Lawful)
To this day an unsolved case will always leave me haunted and bother me.
Through the might of my personality I will solve an investigation or puzzle.
It is my right to believe what I will, just try and stop me.
I need to prove my worth to my fellow Sheriffs
Someone I cared for died under suspicious circumstances. I will find out what happened to them and bring their killer to justice.
I speak for those that cannot speak for themselves.
I always over exaggerate my abilities.
I cannot bear to let those I care for out of my sight.
I took a bribe to tank an investigation and I would do anything to keep it secret.
I have little respect for those that are of "low" intelligence/race.
I always enjoy a good mug of ale... or five to cover up my past.
I speak for the First Lord of Hillsfar and make sure everyone knows it.

_.displayName: Sheriff's insignia (badge) a set of fine clothes

items.name: 技能熟练
items.entry: 从{@skill 欺瞒}、{@skill 洞悉}、{@skill 说服}、和{@skill 隐匿}中选择二个

items.name: 工具熟练
items.entry: 从一种{@filter 赌具|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}、一种{@filter 乐器|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}、和{@item 盗贼工具|phb}中选择二项

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一套符合你任务的服装、和一个装有20金币的{@item 囊袋|phb}

entries.name: 特性：在地之耳
entries: 你经常与那些你猎物所在社会阶层的人们接触。这些人们可能会关联于某个罪犯里世界、街头暴徒、或是上流社会的成员。这种人脉联系会以线人的形式出现在任何你所造访的城市中，这位线人能够提供关于当地居民与场所的情报。

entries.name: 建议特质
entries: 使用《玩家手册》中{@background 罪犯}背景的表格作为你特质和动机的基础，并在适当的时候修改条目以使其符合你作为赏金猎人的身分。
举例来说，你的羁绊可能会涉及其他赏金猎人、或是雇用你的组织或人物。你的理念可能会关联于你总是希望逮到你猎物的决心、或与你维持可靠声望的渴望有关。

items.name: 工具熟练
items.entry: {@item 易容工具|phb}、{@item 盗贼工具|phb}

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一把小刀、一张你成长的城市的地图、一只宠物鼠、一件纪念你双亲的象征物、一套{@item 寻常服装|phb}、和一个装有10金币的缠腰{@item 囊袋|phb}

entries.name: 特性：城市密径
entries: 你知道城市里的各种秘密通道与路径，并可以找到容易被其他人忽略，穿过城市杂乱区域的密径。当你不在战斗中时，你（以及你所带领的同伴）能够以你原本速度的两倍穿梭在城市中的不同区域。

entries.name: 建议特质
entries: 那令人绝望的贫困生活塑造了孤儿的特质，无论是往好的方向，或坏的方面。他们的动机可能是那对街头上同生共死的同伴们许下的承诺，或是那寻找更美好生活的热切渴望—或者，对所有曾恶毒对待他们的富人报复也可能成为他们的动机。

rows: 我把食物残渣和小饰品深藏在口袋里。
我会常常发问。
我喜欢钻进别人找不到我的地方。
我习惯靠着墙或树睡觉，并在睡觉时把所有我的东西抱在怀里。
我的吃相像猪一样，十分没有礼数。
我认为任何对我好的人都不安好心。
我不喜欢洗澡。
我总是直言说出其他人所暗示或想遮掩的事情。
尊重。所有人，不论贫富，都应受到尊重。（善良）
团结。我们必须同舟共济，因为外人不会帮助我们。（守序）
改变。在下位的将会崛起，在上位的将会落败。变化才是万物的本质。（混乱）
报复。富人们应该好好品尝一下阴沟中的生与死是什么样子。（邪恶）
人民。我帮助那些帮了我的人—这是我们生存的根本。（中立）
抱负。我会证明我值得更好的生活。（任意）
这城镇是我的家，我会挺身保卫它。
我资助了一所孤儿院，避免让其他人遭受我所曾遭受过的不幸。
我的幸存要归功于那位教导我如何在街头生存的孤儿。
我欠了一位同情我的绅士一笔我永远还不起的债。
我因抢劫一位大人物而脱贫致富，但我也因此被通缉。
不该再有人遭受我曾经历过的苦难了。
如果我寡不敌众，我会溜之大吉。
黄金对我来说是一大笔钱，而我会为了更多钱而做出任何事。
我永远不会完全信任任何自己以外的人。
我更喜欢趁人之危偷袭，而非公平决斗。
如果我比原物主更需要这个东西，那这就不算盗窃。
如果他们不能保管好自己的东西，那这怪不得谁。

_.special: map of the city you grew up in
token to remember your parents by

items.name: 工具熟练
items.entry: 一种{@filter 乐器|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}或{@filter 工匠工具|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan tool}

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一个{@item 狩猎陷阱|phb}、一个图腾象征物或一套纹身，标示着你对乌斯伽和你部落图腾的忠诚、一套{@item 旅行者服装|phb}、和一个装有10金币的{@item 囊袋|phb}

entries.name: 特性：乌斯伽传统
entries: 不只是你部落的领地，你也对北地其余场所的地形和自然资源有着卓越的知识。你足够熟悉于任何荒野区域，以至于当你在该处觅食时能够找到二倍你原本所能找到的食物和饮用水。
此外，你可以请到你族人、以及那些与你部落同盟的人们的热情招待，通常包括了德鲁伊结社的成员、游牧精灵的部落、竖琴手同盟、以及那些献身于第一循环诸神的祭司。

entries.name: 建议特质
entries: 使用《玩家手册》中{@background 化外之民}的表格作为你特质和动机的基础，并在适当的时候修改条目以使其符合你作为乌斯伽部落成员的身分。
即使你离开了你的部落（至少现在是如此），你仍然坚持着你族人们的传统。你永远不会砍下任何仍活着的树木，且你也不会允许这类行为在你面前发生。乌斯伽先祖的土丘──那乌斯伽击败图腾精魂的伟大丘陵，以及部落英雄们被埋葬的地方──对你们而言无比神圣。
你的羁绊无疑会关联于你的部落、或是关于乌斯伽哲学或文化的某些观点（或甚至乌斯伽本身）。你的理念是你个人的选择，它可能与你的民族精神密切相关，且大概不会违背或放弃作为乌斯伽人所代表的精神。

b.special: set of tattoos marking your loyalty to Uthgar and your tribal totem

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一件代表你军阶的所属组织的制服、一个用来呼唤帮手的{@item 号角|phb}、一副{@item 镣铐|phb}、和一个装有10金币的{@item 囊袋|phb}

entries.name: 特性：守望者之眼
entries: 由于你运行法律、与处理犯法者的丰富经验，你对于地方法律和罪犯有着异常敏锐的感觉。你能轻易地找到当地守卫的哨站或其他类似组织，也能同样轻易地在社会中发现犯罪活动的窝点，尽管你也在前者更容易受到欢迎。

entries.name: 建议特质
entries: 使用《玩家手册》中{@background 士兵}的表格作为你特质和动机的基础，并在适当的时候修改条目以使其符合你作为城市守卫成员的身分。
你的羁绊可能会关联于你城市守卫的同袍们、或是守卫组织本身，且几乎确定会与你所在的社会有关。你的理念可能会包括促进和平与安全。而一名调查员则可能会有着与借由破案来实现正义有关的理念。

_.special: uniform in the style of your unit and indicative of your rank

_.displayName: horn with which to summon help

items.name: 特性：间谍人脉
entries: 你有着一个可靠且可以信赖的联系人，能作为你与其他间谍联系的桥梁。你知道如何接收或传递消息给你的联系人，即使你们之间相隔甚远也一样；具体来说，你可能认识当地的信使、贪腐的商队长、以及能够为你传递消息的肮脏水手。

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一把低廉但不寻常的武器，像是{@item 三叉戟|phb}或{@item 捕网|phb}（自选一种）、一个仰慕者送的小礼物（情书、一缕秀发、或小饰品）、{@item 戏服|phb}、和一个装有15金币的缠腰{@item 囊袋|phb}

items.name: 特性：人见人爱
entries: 你能找到视战斗为娱乐的表演场地，像是角斗场或秘密的战斗俱乐部。在这类场所，只要你每晚演出，你就能获得简朴或舒适标准的免费食宿（取决于该场所的品质）。此外，你的表演将让你成为当地的名人。若你在曾经表演过的城镇中被陌生人认出，他们通常会对你抱有好感。

background.name: 变体公会工匠 (公会商人)

items.name: 特性：公会成员
entries: 作为一名正式且受人尊敬的公会或大型商人财团的成员，你可以享有会员身分所提供给你的某些好处。若有必要，你的公会成员同事会提供你所需的住宿与食物，且在必要的时候支付你的丧葬费用。在某些市镇，公会会馆能提供一个会见你其他同行的场所，这里也是个找到潜在雇主、盟友、或雇工的好地方。
公会和财团通常拥有庞大的政治权力。当你被指控犯罪时，若你可以被证明是无辜的、或者这个罪行是正当的，则你的公会将会支持你，站在你这一边。如果你在公会中有着不错的地位，你也可以通过公会去接触那些有权有势的政治人物。这类联系可能会需要你向公会的金库捐献一些金钱或魔法物品。
你每个月必须向公会支付5金币的会费。如果你拖欠了缴款，则你必须补交会费才能维持你在公会中的名声。

items.name: 工具熟练
items.entry: 一种{@filter 工匠工具|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan tool}或{@item 领航工具|phb}或一个额外的语言

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一套{@filter 工匠工具|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan tool}（自选一种）或一头{@item 骡子|phb}和{@item 运货车|phb}、一封来自你公会的介绍信、一套{@item 旅行者服装|phb}、和一个装有15金币的缠腰囊袋

items.name: 特性：家臣
entries: 你有三个效忠于你家族的家臣。这些家臣可以是侍从、信使、且一个可能会是管家。{@b 你的其中一个家臣会是一名贵族，他作为你的扈从以换取他或她成为骑士的训练。}（这个人可能是你的亲戚）。你剩下的两个家臣可能会包括一名照料你马匹的马伕、以及一名保养（且可能协助你穿上）铠甲的仆从。
你的家臣可以为你运行平凡的任务，但他们并不会为你而战，也不会跟随你前往明显危险的区域（例如地下城）。如果他们经常被威胁或是虐待，他们会离你而去。

items.name: 变体贵族 (骑士)
entries: 骑士身分在大部分的社会文化中是贵族头衔中最低的阶级，但它也可以是一条通往更高地位的途径。若你想成为一名骑士，请选择「家臣」特性以取代「特权阶级」特性。
作为骑士精神跟宫廷爱情的象征，你可以获得一个来自你决定献上生命奉献的贵族领主或女士的旗帜或其他象征物。

items.name: 特性：恶名昭彰
entries: 无论你到什么地方，人们都会因为你的恶名而害怕你。当你身处文明聚落，由于大多数民众不会向权威机关举发你的行为，你可以逃过一些轻微的罪行，像是在酒馆吃霸王餐或是破门闯入当地商店。

items.name: 工具熟练
items.entry: One type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, one type of {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: 装备
items.entry: A set of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} or a {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} (one of your choice), a scroll of your god's teachings, a vizier's cartouche, a set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 25 gp

entries.name: Feature: Voice of Authority
entries: Your voice is the voice of your god, at least in theory. Your job might include training and instructing initiates, and they are required to obey you. In any circumstance, an initiate is expected to defer to your voice and obey your commands. If you abuse this authority, though, your god might personally punish you.

entries.name: 建议特征
entries: A vizier's characteristics strongly reflect the ideals and personality of the god they serve.

rows: Everything I do, I do gracefully and deliberately, and with complete confidence. (Oketra)
Nothing can shake my rock-hard focus. (Oketra)
When I am at peace, I am an oasis of perfect calm in the world. When I am roused to anger, I am an embodiment of terror. (Kefnet)
I enjoy teasing acolytes and initiates with juicy tidbits of knowledge wrapped up in fiendishly difficult puzzles. (Kefnet)
I have the utmost faith in myself and my abilities. (Rhonas)
I get restless when life in the city feels too tame, too safe. (Rhonas)
I enjoy solitude as an opportunity to plan my victory. (Bontu)
I use satire as a way to undermine the teachings of the other gods. (Bontu)
I love, fight, and feast with equal zeal. (Hazoret)
I think of those in my care as my family, in a way that most people have trouble understanding. (Hazoret)
Solidarity. The worthy must respect the worthy. In the afterlife, all will be united in goal and action. (Oketra)
Knowledge. The worthy shall cultivate a nimble mind, so as to perceive the wonders beyond imagination that wait in the afterlife. (Kefnet)
Strength. The worthy shall hone a strong body that can withstand the boundless energies of the afterlife. (Rhonas)
Ambition. The worthy shall strive for greatness, for supremacy in life leads to supremacy in the afterlife. (Bontu)
Zeal. The worthy shall rush to the God-Pharaoh's side with relentless passion, rising to overcome every obstacle in their way. (Hazoret)
Naktamun. The life of the city is ordered according to the plan of the God-Pharaoh, and that order must be preserved at all costs.
My loyalty to my companions embodies the ideal of loyalty to my god. (Oketra)
The teachings of my god are more precious to me than any possession. (Kefnet)
I would do anything to defend the temple of my god from any harm or desecration. (Rhonas)
I am committed to the service of my god—because it's my sure ticket into the afterlife. (Bontu)
I love my god and never want my service to end. (Hazoret)
I have a close friend or lover who is also a vizier.
I am in love with an initiate, and I want to shield this person from death in the trials.
I secretly wish I had not been chosen as a vizier, so I could participate in the trials as an initiate.
I secretly question whether the gods care at all about us or what we do.
A vizier of another god seeks my death in retribution for a past insult.
I am terrified of what lies beyond the Gate to the Afterlife.
I secretly believe the God-Pharaoh's return will not bring blessing to this world.

items.name: 装备
items.entry: A set of {@item common clothes|phb}, a black cloak with a hood, a {@item 制毒工具|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Shadow Network
entries: You have access to the Volstrucker shadow network, which allows you to communicate with other members of the order over long distances. If you write a letter in a special arcane ink, address it to a member of the Volstrucker, and cast it into a fire, the letter will burn to cinders and materialize whole again on the person of the agent you addressed it to.
The ink used to send a letter across the shadow network is the same as that used by a wizard to scribe spells in a spellbook. Writing a letter in this ink costs 10 gp per page.

entries.name: 建议特征
entries: Agents of the Volstrucker are groomed to follow orders without question and to kill without mercy. The trauma that brings one into the order can fester even more strongly against the darkness of a Volstrucker agent's assignments. Officially, no one ever leaves the order—but those desperate enough do whatever it takes to gain some measure of freedom.

rows: I prefer to keep my thoughts to myself.
I indulge vice in excess to quiet my conscience.
I've left emotion behind me. I'm now perfectly placid.
Some event from the past keeps worming its way into my mind, making me restless.
I always keep my word—except when I'm commanded to break it.
I laugh off insults and never take them personally.
Order. The will of the crown is absolute. (Law)
True Loyalty. The Cerberus Assembly is greater than any power, even the crown. (Law)
Death. The penalty for disloyalty is death. (Evil)
Determination. I cannot fail. Not ever. (Neutral)
Fear. People should not respect power. They should fear it. (Evil)
Escape. The Volstrucker are pure evil! I can't atone for what I've done for them, but I can escape with my life. (Any)
The job is all that matters. I will see it through.
My orders are important, but my comrades are worth more than anything. I would die for them.
Everything I've done, I've done to protect someone close to me.
If the empire falls, all of civilization falls with it. I will hold back chaos and barbarism at any cost.
I drink to dull the pain in the back of my head.
I go a bit mad when I see blood.
I can hear the voices of everyone I've killed. I see their faces. I can't be free of these ghosts.
Fear is a powerful motivator. I will do whatever it takes to prevent those who know what I am from seeing me fail, and from those I care about from knowing what I am.

items.name: 装备
items.entry: 一套{@item 高级服装|phb}、一枚{@item 玺戒|phb}或胸针、一卷家系族谱、一囊袋的高级札尔酒或葡萄酒、和一个装有20金币的钱包

entries.name: 特性：保持时尚
entries: 当你在深水城或北地的其他地方，你的家族都会满足你的日常需求。你的名号和玺印足够支付你大部分的开销；旅店、酒馆、和你常光顾的会所都很乐意记下你的债款，并将帐单寄到你家族在深水城的庄园以结清你的债务。
这个优势将允许你过着舒适的生活风格而无需为其支付每日2金币的开销，或者让你在过着富裕或奢华的生活风格时能减少该数值的开销。你不能维持开销在这之下的生活风格以利用这个差额作为收入──这个好处代表的是信用额度，而非实际的财政奖励。

entries.name: 建议特质
entries: 使用《玩家手册》中{@background 贵族}的表格作为你特质和动机的基础，并在适当的时候修改条目以使其符合你作为深水城人贵族家系成员的身分。
和其他贵族一样，你出生并成长在一个与大多数群众所知不同的世界──一个赋予你特权，但也要求你履行与你身分相符职责义务的世界。你的羁绊可能只会与你的家族有关，或可能关联于其他与你们同盟或对立的贵族家系。你的理念在某种程度上取决于你如何看待你在家族中扮演的角色，以及你作为你家族的代表，打算如何在这个大千世界中处世。

_.special: skin of fine zzar or wine
